revised_title: Sedimentary and Faunal Study of the Blue Lias in Dorset and Glamorgan
tldr: This study examines the sedimentary and faunal characteristics of the Blue Lias in Dorset and Glamorgan, dividing the rocks into off-shore and near-shore facies. The research explores the patterns of limestone, marl, and bituminous shale in the off-shore facies, as well as the skeletal limestones, oolites, conglomerates, and cherty beds in the near-shore facies. The study also investigates the relationship between the fauna and the sediments, as well as the environmental conditions, such as temperature, salinity, sedimentation rate, depth of the sea, and current strengths.
